name: All My Exes are in Mechsuits
name_original: All My Exes are in Mechsuits
description:
A role-playing game for three players.

The Pilot will sit in the cockpit and fly their mech into battle.

The Mech will support the Pilot and keep them on task to complete their mission.

The Ex will throw a wrench into everything.

Created for #sadmechjam.
